description: The Agony in the Garden; Circle of Pietro Novelli (Italian (Sicilian), 1603 - 1647); about 1640?; Pen and brown ink and brown wash over traces of black chalk; remnants of old ruled framing lines in dark brown ink along all four edges; 28.9 x 21.3 cm (11 3/8 x 8 3/8 in.); 94.GA.96; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
